name: Stardome
description:
Stardome is a 3D retro space side-scroller shooter created in one week for the GamesPlusJam, with a rich backstory written by Apius Escobar you'll experience the battle of Joelson Jones against the forces of the Space Miner Syndicate in this thrilling adventure.

How to play:

W to move Up

S to move Down

J to Shoot

Yeah, it is that simple!
